Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Congress to pass, and the President to sign, the Save Our Stages (SOS) Bill (S.4258/H.R.7806) to establish a grant program for small live venue operators and talent representatives to address the economics effects of COVID-19.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Cumbo, Van Bramer, Borelli and Moya
